DOC.brief_summary: To explore neurophysiological marker ( electroencephalography ) cognitive effect vortioxetine
DOC.brief_title: Electroencephalography Study Investigating Effects Vortioxetine Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: The subject normal rest EEG screen visit The subject able perform task auditory stimulus The subject visually impaired normal prescription glass accept The subject normal circadian rhythm , define person usually wake 6:00 9:00 a.m. go sleep 9:00 pm midnight . The subject work shift , include night duty , travel across > 3 time zone < 2 week prior first dose IMP . Other inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
